name: Saddiq Bey
comment: Bey (trade pending) is questionable for Saturday's game versus the Spurs.

name: Aaron Holiday
comment: Holiday (illness) is questionable for Saturday's game versus the Spurs, Lauren L. Williams of The Atlanta Journal-Constitution reports.

name: Al Horford
comment: Horford (knee) has been ruled out for Friday's game against the Hornets, John Karalis of BostonSportsJournal.com reports.

name: Jaylen Brown
comment: Brown's (face) status will be updated next week, Jay King of The Athletic reports.

name: Marcus Smart
comment: Smart (ankle) won't play in Friday's game versus the Hornets, Steve Hewitt of the Boston Herald reports.

name: Danilo Gallinari
comment: Gallinari (knee) said Sunday in an interview with Gianluca Bortolomai of AroundTheGame.com that his goal remains to return to game action at some point during the Celtics' postseason run.

name: Cameron Johnson
comment: Johnson (trade pending) is questionable for Saturday's game versus Philadelphia.

name: Mikal Bridges
comment: Bridges (trade pending) is questionable for Saturday's matchup against the 76ers, Alex Schiffer of The Athletic reports.

name: Nic Claxton
comment: Claxton (hamstring) is probable for Saturday's game against the 76ers.

name: Seth Curry
comment: Curry (thigh) has been ruled out for Saturday's matchup against the 76ers, Alex Schiffer of The Athletic reports.

name: Svi Mykhailiuk
comment: Mykhailiuk is out for Friday's game versus the Celtics as he is not with the team.

name: Cody Martin
comment: Martin (knee) is out for Friday's game versus the the Celtics.

name: Reggie Jackson
comment: Jackson will likely agree to a contract buyout with the Hornets, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Kelly Oubre Jr.
comment: Oubre suggested Thursday that he expects to transition into a smaller brace to protect his surgically repaired left hand, Roderick Boone of The Charlotte Observer reports. He anticipates wearing the brace for 1-to-2 weeks. "And then right after [the 1-to-2-week period] we'll be at All-Star break," Oubre said. "And then that's, Godspeed, the plan to come back."

name: Patrick Williams
comment: Williams is probable for Saturday's game versus the Cavaliers due to a right ankle sprain.

name: Alex Caruso
comment: Caruso (foot) is probable for Saturday's game against Cleveland.

name: DeMar DeRozan
comment: DeRozan (hip) is probable for Saturday's game against Cleveland.

name: Javonte Green
comment: Head coach Billy Donovan said Monday that Green (knee) still isn't running, and it's unclear when he'll be able to suit up again, Julia Poe of the Chicago Tribune reports.

name: Lonzo Ball
comment: Coach Billy Donovan said before Saturday's game against the Magic that Ball (knee) is "nowhere close" to returning and the team will have a formal conversation about a cut-off date if nothing improves by the All-Star break, Julia Poe of the Chicago Tribune reports.

name: Ricky Rubio
comment: Rubio has been ruled out for Friday's game against the Pelicans due to left knee injury management.

name: Dylan Windler
comment: Head coach J.B. Bickerstaff said Monday that Windler (ankle) is making progress and expected to play at some point this season, but the forward remains out indefinitely, Evan Dammarell of FearTheSword.com reports.

name: Luka Doncic
comment: Doncic (heel) has been ruled out for Friday's game against Sacramento.

name: Davis Bertans
comment: Bertans (calf) is expected to miss at least two weeks, Callie Caplan of The Dallas Morning News reports.

name: Maxi Kleber
comment: Kleber (hamstring) will remain out for the Mavericks' upcoming five-game road trip but has been cleared for contact work, Callie Caplan of The Dallas Morning News reports.

name: Collin Gillespie
comment: Gillespie (lower leg) won't play in Saturday's matchup with Charlotte.

name: Thomas Bryant
comment: Bryant (trade) is not yet with the Nuggets and is questionable to make his team debut Saturday against the Hornets.

name: Jamal Murray
comment: Murray (knee) is questionable for Saturday's matchup against the Hornets.

name: James Wiseman
comment: Wiseman (recently traded) has been ruled out for Friday's game against the Spurs, James L. Edwards III of The Athletic reports.

name: Nerlens Noel
comment: Noel (personal) won't play Friday against the Spurs, James L. Edwards III of The Athletic reports.

name: Marvin Bagley III
comment: Bagley underwent surgery to repair a fracture of the third and fourth metacarpals in his right hand Thursday and will be re-evaluated in six weeks, NBA writer Marc Stein reports.

name: Cade Cunningham
comment: Cunningham (lower leg) underwent successful surgery Friday to stabilize and promote healing of his left tibial stress fracture, James L. Edwards III of The Athletic reports.

name: Andre Iguodala
comment: Iguodala (hip) has been ruled out Saturday against the Lakers.

name: Stephen Curry
comment: Curry (lower leg) will not take the floor before the All-Star break, Jason Anderson of The Sacramento Bee reports.

name: John Wall
comment: Wall (abdomen) was notified that he'll be waived by the Rockets on Thursday, Chris Haynes of Turner Sports reports.

name: Kevin Porter Jr.
comment: Porter (foot) is out for Friday's matchup with the Heat.

name: Jordan Nwora
comment: Nwora (trade pending) is out for Saturday's game versus Washington, Dustin Dopirak of The Indianapolis Star reports.

name: George Hill
comment: Hill is out for Friday's game versus the Suns due to his trade pending.

name: Bones Hyland
comment: Hyland (trades pending) won't play Friday against the Bucks, Justin Russo of the 'Clip &amp; Roll' podcast reports.

name: Mason Plumlee
comment: Plumlee will not make his Clippers debut Friday against the Bucks ,Andrew Greif of the Los Angeles Times reports.

name: Eric Gordon
comment: Gordon will not play in Friday's game against the Bucks, Andrew Greif of the Los Angeles Times reports.

name: Kawhi Leonard
comment: Leonard will not play Friday due to right knee injury management, Joey Linn of SI.com

name: Scotty Pippen Jr.
comment: The Lakers assigned Pippen (concussion) to the South bay Lakers of the G League on Friday, Ryan Ward of LakersNation.com reports.

name: LeBron James
comment: James (ankle) is listed as questionable for Saturday's clash with the Warriors, Dan Woike of the Los Angeles Times reports.

name: Anthony Davis
comment: Davis (foot) is probable for Saturday's tilt against the Warriors, Kyle Goon of The Orange County Register reports.

name: Mo Bamba
comment: The Magic traded Bamba (suspension) to the Lakers in exchange for Patrick Beverley on Thursday, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.

name: Luke Kennard
comment: Kennard (recently traded) is unlikely to play Friday against the Timberwolves, Damichael Cole of The Memphis Commercial Appeal reports.

name: Steven Adams
comment: Adams has been diagnosed with a PCL sprain in his right knee and is expected to miss the next 3-to-5 weeks.

name: Udonis Haslem
comment: Haslem will not play in Friday's game versus the Rockets for personal reasons.

name: Duncan Robinson
comment: Robinson (finger) is out for Thursday's game versus the Rockers, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Victor Oladipo
comment: Oladipo (ankle) is out for Friday's game versus the Rockets, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Kyle Lowry
comment: Lowry (knee) will be out for the next three games, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports. His next chance to play arrives Monday against the Nuggets.

name: Omer Yurtseven
comment: Yurtseven's left ankle has fully healed from surgery, and he's been cleared for high-impact work, Barry Jackson of the Miami Herald reports.

name: Nikola Jovic
comment: Jovic (back) will miss another four weeks, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Bobby Portis
comment: Portis (knee) is out for Friday's game versus the Clippers.

name: Khris Middleton
comment: Middleton (rest) has been ruled out for Friday's game against the Clippers, Joey Linn of SI.com reports.

name: Jae Crowder
comment: The Nets traded Crowder to the Bucks on Thursday for five second-round picks, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Karl-Anthony Towns
comment: Timberwolves general manager Tim Connelly relayed Tuesday that Towns (calf) remains sidelined indefinitely, Dane Moore of 'The Dane Moore NBA Podcast' reports.

name: Josh Richardson
comment: Richardson (recently traded) won't play Friday against the Cavaliers, Christian Clark of The New Orleans Times-Picayune reports.

name: Dyson Daniels
comment: Daniels (ankle) has been ruled out for Friday's contest against Cleveland, Andrew Lopez of ESPN.com reports.

name: Zion Williamson
comment: Williamson (hamstring) will be re-evaluated after the All-Star break, Andrew Lopez of ESPN.com reports.

name: E.J. Liddell
comment: Liddell (knee) signed a two-way contract with the Pelicans on Sunday.

name: Josh Hart
comment: Hart (recently traded) won't be available for Friday's game versus the 76ers.

name: Mitchell Robinson
comment: Knicks team owner James Dolan said Thursday in his appearance on the "Good Day New York" program that Robinson (thumb) will be sidelined for four more weeks, Steve Popper of Newsday reports.

name: Dario Saric
comment: Saric (trade pending) is out for Friday's game versus Portland, Joe Mussatto of The Oklahoman reports.

name: Jeremiah Robinson-Earl
comment: Robinson-Earl (ankle) remains on assignment with the G League's Oklahoma City Blue and won't play in Monday's matchup against the Warriors.

name: Aleksej Pokusevski
comment: Pokusevski sustained a non-displaced tibial plateau fracture in his left leg Tuesday's game against the Thunder and will be re-evaluated in six to eight weeks, Nick Crain of Forbes.com reports.

name: Chet Holmgren
comment: Holmgren (foot) underwent a successful secondary procedure Tuesday to remove hardware from his initial Lisfranc surgery in August, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Gary Harris
comment: Harris (groin) is considered questionable for Saturday's game versus the Heat.

name: Darius Bazley
comment: Bazley (trade) will not make his Suns debut Friday against the Pacers, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: T.J. Warren
comment: Warren (recently traded) won't play Friday against the Pacers, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Kevin Durant
comment: Phoenix has agreed to trade Mikal Bridges, Cam Johnson, Jae Crowder, four first-round picks and a 2028 pick swap to Brooklyn for Durant and TJ Warren, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.

name: Cameron Payne
comment: The Suns announced Friday that Payne (foot) will be re-evaluated in a week, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Landry Shamet
comment: Shamet (foot) won't play Monday against the Raptors and is out indefinitely, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Kevin Knox II
comment: Knox (trade) isn't available for Friday's game versus the Thunder, Sean Highkin of RoseGardenReport.com reports.

name: Matisse Thybulle
comment: Thybulle will not play against the Thunder on Friday.

name: Justise Winslow
comment: Winslow (ankle) will not play in Friday's game against the Thunder.

name: Ibou Badji
comment: Badji (knee) will not play in Friday's game against Oklahoma City.

name: Jusuf Nurkic
comment: Nurkic is in line to be sidelined through the All-Star break after an MRI on Thursday revealed a left calf strain.

name: KZ Okpala
comment: Okpala has been recalled to the NBA club from the G League's Stockton Kings, but he won't play in Friday's matchup against the Mavericks due to bilateral knee soreness, Sean Cunningham of Fox 40 Sacramento reports.

name: Romeo Langford
comment: Langford (thigh) is out for Friday's game against the Pistons, Ty Jager of PoundingTheRock.com reports.

name: Keldon Johnson
comment: Johnson (ankle) has been ruled out for Friday's game against Detroit, Bruno Passos of PoundingTheRock.com reports.

name: Jeremy Sochan
comment: Sochan (back) has been ruled out for Friday's matchup against the Pistons, independent NBA writer Matthew Tynan reports.

name: Tre Jones
comment: Jones (foot) has been ruled out for Friday's matchup against the Pistons, independent NBA writer Matthew Tynan reports.

name: Devin Vassell
comment: Vassell (knee) said Friday that he still doesn't have a specific return date, but he's still aiming to be back sometime after the All-Star break, Tom Osborn of the San Antonio Express-News reports.

name: O.G. Anunoby
comment: Anunoby (wrist) has been ruled out Friday against the Jazz, Vivek Jacob of the Raptors' official site reports.

name: Otto Porter Jr.
comment: The Raptors announced Tuesday that Porter underwent season-ending surgery on his left foot, Marc J. Spears of ESPN.com reports.

name: Jordan Clarkson
comment: Clarkson (non-COVID illness) will not play Friday against the Raptors, Andy Larsen of The Salt Lake Tribune reports.

name: Damian Jones
comment: Jones is out for Friday's game versus the Raptors due to his trade pending, Ben Anderson of KSL News Salt Lake City reports.

name: Juan Toscano-Anderson
comment: Toscano-Anderson is out for Friday's game versus the Raptors due to his trade pending, Ben Anderson of KSL News Salt Lake City reports.

name: Russell Westbrook
comment: Westbrook (trade) won't make his Jazz debut Friday versus the Raptors, Andy Larsen of The Salt Lake Tribune reports.

name: Kyle Kuzma
comment: Kuzma (ankle) remains out for Saturday's game versus the Pacers.
